title: Stunning SE Corner w/ Floor-Ceiling Windows! 2 On-Site Gyms! Dog Park!
map_address: 3801 Stone Way, North near N 38th Street
posting_body: Make it Easy - Call Today for more info.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 660 Sq.
Bowman is North Seattle's newest apartment community.
Bowman evokes inspired Stone Way living.
Kick off your shoes and take in the views!
Located right in Wallingford, where many of the city's most creative-minded restaurants and shops have made a home.
Easy on the eyes, and on the lifestyle.
Bowman homes are relaxed modern, with splashes of serene color that add an infusion of warmth.
Situated in Seattle's next destination district, Bowman is a sophisticated invitation to a chill lakeside vibe.
Call us to learn more information and select your favorite floorplan.

Floor to ceiling windows, Carrera quartz countertops, Juliette balconies or full decks avail, Carpet in bedrooms, Linen closets*, Wood-like plank flooring, Plenty of storage, Oversized windows and swing doors that open to the patio or balconies*, Chalk Board Accent Walls, Kitchens that make a statement, Glossy kitchen cabinets in white or navy blue, Expansive ceiling height in many homes, Porcelain tile backsplashes, Open to the street or courtyard with your own private patios*, Stainless, GE kitchen appliances, Custom pendant lighting*, Islands or peninsula counters, Pantry cabinets in kitchens

Large rooftop deck, Meeting Room, Personalized package system, Shuffleboard, Greenhouse Lounge, Dog Run, Media Room, Ping Pong, Gaming Lounge, Sports Lounge, Courtyard, Foosball Table, Expansive Lobby, Dog Wash area, Wave G Internet access available, Cardio Fitness Room, Crossfit/TRX Room
*Prices and Availability are subject to change.
Pet Friendly - Large Dogs Up to 80lbs
